comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Ōura Kanetake (大浦 兼武?, June 15, 1850 – September 30, 1918) was a politician and bureaucrat in late Meiji and early Taishō period Empire of Japan. In 1907, he was raised to the rank and title of danshaku (baron) under the kazoku peerage system. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C5%8Cura_Kanetake
